item.title: Two-Time Trans Am Champion Is Looking For A Cool Car!
item.description: A two-time Trans Am champion is on the hunt for a standout car, blending racing passion with classic style.

media:content.media:title: Two-Time Trans Am Champion Is Looking For A Cool Car!
media:content.media:description: A two-time Trans Am champion is on the hunt for a standout car, blending racing passion with classic style.

item.title: Making Classic Cars Fit Perfectly
item.description: See how classic cars are carefully adjusted to achieve a perfect fit, blending original design with timeless craftsmanship.

item.title: Who Forgot To Fuel The Mule?
item.description: A lighthearted look at what happens when a dependable ride is left without fuel.

item.title: Falcon for a Porsche: Ted's Got a Deal!
item.description: Ted works out a unique trade, swapping a Falcon for a Porsche in a deal that blends classic style with performance.

item.title: Keeping The Original Engine Alive!
item.description: The team works carefully to preserve and maintain the original engine, keeping classic performance alive.

item.title: Ted Wanted 42.5K… He Got 40K
item.description: Negotiations heat up as Ted lowers his price, closing the deal at $40,000 instead of the $42,500 he hoped for.

item.title: School Project Turns Into A Cadillac Rescue
item.description: What started as a school project quickly turned into a mission to rescue a Cadillac, bringing teamwork and effort to the forefront.

item.title: We Found The Best Jade Mining Pit!
item.description: The crew uncovers a highly promising jade pit, raising hopes for valuable finds and a successful mining season.

item.title: 2000 Ft Drilled… Still No Jade?
item.description: The miners push their drill deeper in search of jade, facing challenges and uncertainty as the quest continues.

item.title: Drilling for Millions!
item.description: The team drills carefully, searching for high-value jade that could be worth millions, showcasing skill and precision in mining.

item.title: Quest for a GTC Bentley leads to Ted's garage!
item.description: A car enthusiast’s search for a Bentley GTC brings them to Ted’s garage, where luxury meets classic style.

item.title: Brooklyn Banking in Style
item.description: Cruising through Brooklyn in style with a classic motorcycle and vintage car—where timeless design meets the city streets.

item.title: Daytona’s Best Pizza… And Chaos
item.description: Serving up some of Daytona’s best pizza while handling the chaos of a packed and lively day at the shop.

item.title: Will He Approve the Work?
item.description: The team completes the repairs and waits to see if the mechanic signs off, highlighting the importance of quality and precision.

item.title: Pulling an Army Truck Uphill!
item.description: Watch the crew tackle the challenging task of pulling a heavy army truck uphill, testing strength, skill, and teamwork.

item.title: Preparation For Congo's Independence Day!
item.description: Communities prepare to celebrate Congo’s Independence Day with decorations, events, and festivities marking this important national occasion.

item.title: Crazy Mud Rescue in Action!
item.description: The team tackles a challenging mud rescue, working together to free vehicles and navigate tricky terrain safely.

item.title: He Promised To Never Return To Congo!
item.description: After his experiences, he vows not to return to Congo, reflecting on the challenges and reasons behind his choice.

item.title: Dad Wants A Safer Car For His Daughter!
item.description: A father looks for a car that balances safety and performance, ensuring his daughter has a reliable and secure ride.

item.title: Winds Strong Enough to Rip Doors Off
item.description: Powerful winds cause damage and create hazards, showing the force of nature and the importance of staying safe outdoors.
